stealth.details: (master) to notice your vision tint red

details.description: A wailing spirit appears and gouges their own eyes. As they do, blood seeps from the eyes of those who witness the act, obscuring their vision.
details.disable: @Check[type:diplomacy|dc:30|name:Talk to the spirit] (master) to talk the spirit out of gouging its eyes or @Check[type:religion|dc:32|name:Ease the spirit's sorrows] (trained) to ease the spirit's sorrows

description.value:
Trigger A creature approaches within 15 feet

Effect Blood seeps from the eyes of all creatures within @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet}, dealing persistent bleed damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:33] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes [[/r {2d8+3}[persistent,bleed]]]{2d8+3} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Bleed Damage} and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Dazzled]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

Failure The creature takes [[/r {4d8+6}[persistent,bleed]]]{4d8+6} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Bleed Damage} and is dazzled for as long as the persistent damage lasts.

Critical Failure The creature takes [[/r {8d8+12}[persistent,bleed]]]{8d8+12} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Bleed Damage} and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Blinded]{Blinded} for as long as the persistent damage lasts.
